title: Headless Stack Overflow Daily Attendance
description: Stack Overflow awards a gold badge for checking into the site for 100 days in a row. I wrote a simple script which uses the phantom.js headless browser to log in and read the progress of the badge. Then I set this script up to run every day.
content: Who actually uses the site every day? After logging in for 40 days straight and then losing it, I snapped and wrote this script. Phantom.js allows you to use a "Headless" browser to automate your nefarious internet operations. It's quite easy to build up a simple application to navigate through some pages. Then you can leverage Linux's cron utility to schedule tasks.
